executable.title: Compare Fiducials
executable.description: Compares two .fcsv or .wts text files and verifies that they are identicle. Used for testing landmarks files.

string-vector.name: inputLandmarkFile2
string-vector.label: Second input file
string-vector.description: Second input landmark file. This can be a vector of baseline file names (.fcsv or .wts)

file.name: weights
file.label: Weights file for adjusting weight tolerances
file.description: Weights on the tolerance to accept ( tolerance / weights )

double.name: tolerance
double.label: The maximum error (in mm) allowed in each direction of a landmark
double.description: The maximum error (in mm) allowed in each direction of a landmark
